about_the_game:
What if there was a world where monsters existed, but first they needed to be created in a factory before they could be shipped off to scare people?
Welcome to Monster Shopper, where you will be taking care of that production cycle.

Each client will want their own type of monster. Assemble the correct body parts, and give them the right color. With more and more clients wanting their own monster; get ready to make complex factories.
How long can you keep your factory in business?

Factory Features

  • Conveyor belts
  • Body part spawner
  • Body part combiner
  • Dyer
  • Splitter
  • Underground conveyor belts

Don't forget to wishlist Monster Shopper to help with development, and get notified when the game releases!

short_description: The Monster Market is back open! Use automation to assemble monster parts into the proper monsters, and keep your customers happy. A fun, relaxing, and challenging puzzle game where you have full control over how difficult it gets.
